00038          * Daemon runs...

00044 
00045 void start_daemon() {
00046 
00047         if ( 0 == access(LOCKFILE, 0) ) {
00048                 fprintf(stderr, "Daemon couldn't be started.\nIs another instance started? When not please delete the file: %s\n", LOCKFILE);
00049                 exit(1);
00050         }
00051 
00052         pid_t d_pid = fork();
00053 
00054         if ( 0 > d_pid ) {
00055                 fprintf(stderr, "Error in start_daemon(): %s\n", errno);
00056                 exit(1);
00057         }
00058 
00059         if ( 0 < d_pid ) {
00060                 printf("Daemon started succesfully!\n");
00061                 exit(0);
00062         } else {
00063                 FILE *lockfile = fopen(LOCKFILE, "w");
00064                 fprintf(lockfile, "%d\n", getpid());
00065                 fclose(lockfile);
00066         }
00067 }
00068 
00069 void stop_daemon() {
00070         printf("Daemon will be closed...\n");
00071         remove(LOCKFILE);
00072         exit(0);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void dbus_listen() {
00076         DBusMessage *msg;
00077         DBusMessage *reply;
00078         DBusMessageIter args;
00079         DBusConnection *conn;
00080         DBusError error;
00081         int ret;
00082         char *param;
00083 
00084         dbus_error_init(&error);
00085 
00086         conn = dbus_bus_get(DBUS_BUS_SESSION, &error);
00087         if ( dbus_error_is_set(&error) ) {
00088                 // TODO: Substitude with a log entry
00089                 fprintf(stderr, "Connection Error (%s)\n", error.message);
00090                 dbus_error_free(&error);
00091         }
00092         if ( NULL == conn ) {
00093                 fprintf(stderr, "Connection Null\n");
00094                 exit(1);
00095         }
00096 
00097         ret = dbus_bus_request_name(conn, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall", DBUS_NAME_FLAG_REPLACE_EXISTING, &error);
00098         if ( dbus_error_is_set(&error) ) {
00099                 // TODO: Substitude with a log entry
00100                 fprintf(stderr, "Name Error (%s)\n", error.message);
00101                 dbus_error_free(&error);
00102         }
00103         if ( DBUS_REQUEST_NAME_REPLY_PRIMARY_OWNER != ret ) {
00104                 fprintf(stderr, "Not Primary Owner (%d)\n", ret);
00105                 exit(1);
00106         }
00107 
00108         while (true) {
00109                 dbus_connection_read_write(conn, 0);
00110                 msg = dbus_connection_pop_message(conn);
00111 
00112                 if ( NULL == msg ) {
00113                         sleep(1);
00114                         continue;
00115                 }
00116 
00117                 if ( dbus_message_is_method_call(msg, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall.Checking", "checkwhitelist") )
00118                         printf("Here comes the method call check_blacklist_entry(...)\n");
00119                 if ( dbus_message_is_method_call(msg, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall.Checking", "checkblacklist") )
00120                         printf("Here comes the method call check_whitelist_entry(...)\n");
00121 
00122                 dbus_message_unref(msg);
00123         }
00124 
00125 }
